DOC.brief_title: STEMI Versus NSTEMI : Clinical Angiographic Differences
DOC.detailed_description: Assessment risk profile . Diabetes mellitus diagnose fast blood glucose ( FBG ) > = 126mg/dL patient take oral hypoglycaemic drug insulin treatment . Hypertension define blood pressure > = 140/90 mmHg history antihypertensive treatment . Hypercholesterolemia , adjudicate cholesterol level > = 200 mg/dL patient lipid lower treatment . Hypertriglyceridemia adjudicate fast triglyceride level > = 200 mg/dL triglyceride-lowering therapy . Obesity , define BMI > = 30 kg/m2 . Patients STEMI , previously treat thrombolysis , undergone unsuccessful thrombolysis , well patient NSTEMI TIMI score > 3 immediately referred Cat Lab whenever possible treat PTCA stenting culprit lesion . The patient refer Cat Lab within 48 hour begin chest pain , unless general condition strongly suggest delay procedure 2 day .
